author: nartyre
content:
Hey guys i've been managing my own fats node for a few weeks and I've been having this error since shapella upgrade and can't figure out how to fix it
Served engine_newPayloadV2               conn=192.168.176.2:36272 reqid=1 duration=4.217548ms err="Invalid parameters" errdata="{Error:nil withdrawals post-shanghai}"

author: nartyre
content: It's certainly a noob mistake I made so any help is more than welcome

author: nishant0
content: You need to update your geth node to `v1.11.5`

author: nartyre
content: I'm using docker and my image is set as :stable

author: nartyre
content: I thought a simple docker compose pull and restart would do the trick but apparently not

author: nishant0
content: Yeah, its probably cached for that tag, so it doesn't pull in the new sha for the current `stable` tag. You can try with the `v1.11.5` tag

author: nartyre
content: I'll do that rn and keep you posted ðŸ™‚

author: nartyre
content: Here is a little more data about what's happening

author: nartyre
content: if anybody has an idea pls save my day I'm slowly turning mad here

author: steven_lll
content: Hi,Does anyone know that now the protocol returns the 32 ETH to validator is through  withdrawal operation instead of  a transaction when validator exit. Is that means  the balance of deposit contract will also continue to increase as time goes by?

author: pietjepuk
content:
> 32 ETH to validator is through  withdrawal operation instead of  a transaction when validator exit
Just a balance increase. _Not_ a transaction.

> that means  the balance of deposit contract will also continue to increase as time goes by
Yes
